hyperCycle
Class HyperCycleSimulation

java.lang.Object
  sim.engine.SimState
      hyperCycle.HyperCycleSimulation
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class HyperCycleSimulation
extends sim.engine.SimState

This class hold all information for the simulation. These structures are the current parameters for computation and the grid with all the cells. A second grid is stored as a 'shadow register' to store the old values of all the cells. The old state has to be preserved because computing on the current states and concurrently modifying these will result in corrupt computation.

Author:
hoehne
